articles.description: Team GB's men's curlers are now just two victories away from a remarkable Winter Olympic gold after sneaking into Thursday's semi-finals in Cortina.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: GB's men into semi-finals after Italy lose final game

articles.description: Listen live and follow text commentary of Celtic's Europa League knockout play-off round first leg tie with Stuttgart.
articles.title: Celtic vs Stuttgart: UEFA Europa League radio commentary, text updates & match report

articles.description: Keely Hodgkinson breaks the long-standing women's indoor 800m world record set by Slovenia's Jolanda Ceplak on the day the Briton was born in 2002.
articles.title: Keely Hodgkinson breaks long-standing indoor 800m world record

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Manchester United vs Atletico Madrid in the Uefa Women's Champions League
articles.title: UEFA Women's Champions League LIVE: Build up to Man Utd vs Atletico Madrid - text updates, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Vitor Pereira asks his Nottingham Forest players to "express themselves" prior to their commanding victory at Fenerbahce in the first leg of their Europa League knockout round play-off tie.
articles.title: Vitor Pereira: New Nottingham Forest manager's message hits home at Fenerbahce

articles.description: Hull Kingston Rovers withstand a fierce comeback from Brisbane Broncos to win the World Club Challenge.
articles.title: World Club Challenge: Hull KR 30-24 Brisbane Broncos

articles.description: Four sides in The Hundred with links to the IPL are not expected to sign players from Pakistan in next month's auction.
articles.title: The Hundred: IPL-linked teams 'not considering Pakistan players'

articles.description: Chelsea head coach Liam Rosenior says anyone found guilty of racist behaviour in football "shouldn't be in the game".
articles.title: Liam Rosenior say 'anyone found guilty of racism should not be in the game'
'Keep calm,' says Domenicali on criticism of new F1 rules

articles.description: Crystal Palace fail to make their dominance count as they are held to a draw by Zrinjski Mostar in the first leg of their Conference League play-off tie.
articles.title: Zrinjski 1-1 Crystal Palace: Ismaila Sarr scores but Palace held on frustrating night
